attributes.action: Dismiss Michael Martin, Speaker of the House of Commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the public, believe that the Prime Minister should dismiss the Speaker of the House of Commons, Michael Martin with immediate effect without benefits for his role in the expenses abuse saga.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
